talksYaml.title: Intro to DevOps in Python
talksYaml.description:
This lightning talk will provide an introduction to DevOps practices and tooling in the python ecosystem.

This lightning talk will include examples of:
- Testing
- Deployment automation
- Logging
- Monitoring
- DevOps principles

All in five minutes!

If you want to reduce the suffering and toil that can be involved with developing and deploying python applications, this talk will give you a brief overview of a limited subset of some of the concepts and tools used in industry and the python community to go faster and with less mistakes.
